CRL.MC NO. 303 OF 2024 2
ORDER
Learned Public Prosecutor submitted that the petitioner herein has
filed an application before the jail authorities under Rule 4 of the
Prison Rules on 8/1/2024 and that petition will be taken for
consideration along with the report of the Station House Officer
concerned. The 2"? respondent Superintendent of Central Prison
Thavanoor, Malappuram is directed to consider the petition dated
8/1/2024 submitted by the petitioner herein, and to pass appropriate
orders on or before 20/1/2024.
With the above direction, this Crl.M.C is disposed of.
Sd/-
SOPHY THOMAS
JUDGE
